title: Shop Crush
description: Manage your Thrift Shop. Sell a hodgepodge of merchandise to picky customers. Set the prices, bargain with clients, and turn down suspicious offers. Order popular stock, fight off shoplifters, and manage your reputation — gain or lose it based on your choices!
longDescription:
<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-1ql2b](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-1ql2b.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# About Shop Crush
<!--text-->
**Manage** your Thrift Shop. **Sell** a hodgepodge of merch to picky customers. **Set** the **prices**, **bargain** with clients, and turn down suspicious offers. **Order** popular stock, **fight** off shoplifters, and **manage** your reputation — gain or lose it based on your choices!

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-1ynfw](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-1ynfw.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Own a Thrift Shop
<!--text-->
Yes, you **own** a **Thrift Shop**! Clients come every day to buy their preferred products. To keep your business profitable, you must **monitor** your **prices** and the number of **products** clients want.

In this *choice-driven* **Visual Novel**, you must **balance** the profitability of the offer with the reputational loss that every purchase can cause.

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-1joba](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-1joba.jpg)

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-1c63q](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-1c63q.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Find New Buyers
<!--text-->
**Connect** with different **customers** and help them find what they want. Every customer has a unique **personality**, purchasing **patterns**, and **preferences**. Build **relationships** with your favorite customers, give them the best deals, and try to keep up with their *needs*, *demands*, and *wishes*.

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-kdq4y](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-kdq4y.jpg)

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-1b78h](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-1b78h.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Buy New Products and Refill the Supply
<!--text-->
**Order** new stock in the catalog. Keep your **shelves stocked** so your buyers have what they need. Some products are **popular** with specific buyers but not in demand by others.

**Selling** common goods, like *milk*, will get you a safe income, while **risking** selling sin goods will **cash you out**.

**Control** the customer's *rage* to protect your shop's reputation. If your **reputation** is low, people will avoid your shop.

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-rshl7](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-rshl7.jpg)

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-1hhyb](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-1hhyb.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Enhance and Personalize Buyers
<!--text-->
**Level Up** Your **Customers** to Improve Their **Purchasing Power**. Customers improve their **Visit Frequency**, **Average Check**, and **Reputation** at every level.

**Select** a character's **skin** (*gender*) you like, and change it whenever you want during the game. There are three skin types supported: *alien*, *female*, and *male*.

**Customers** have **preferences** for their favorite and least **favorite goods** they want to buy from you.

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-1k4dh](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-1k4dh.png)

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-1k8kz](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-1k8kz.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Explore the Literal Illusions
<!--text-->
**Zoom**, **rotate** and **drag** the hidden pictures to uncover your customers' secrets. Every buyer has a **Literal Illusion Puzzle** connected to their persona. **Complete** all the puzzles to discover the horror your shop is hiding.

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-e2v3y](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-e2v3y.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Key Features and Contents
<!--text-->
- Choice-based Card Game with tense and procedurally generated Core Gameplay.
- 2D Shop Simulator and an Economy game about trading with Customers.
- Atmospheric Visual Novel about insanity, doubt, and Reality Check.
- Innovative Puzzle Game based on the Literal Illusion Effect.
- 10 Unique Clients, each with their tastes and shopping styles.
- 5 Selected locations with carefully crafted storylines.
- 50+ Levels to Upgrade Every Customer.
- 70+ Products to buy - from weird ones to essentials!

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Meet the Customers!
<!--text-->
Who is visiting your shop?

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-32b5i](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-32b5i.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Leslie, a Poor Customer
<!--text-->
A poor customer who usually buys trash. Sometimes, you may get a good offer from them. You will always have a small profit if you sell them cheap stuff for a tiny margin.

**Likes:** Rubber Ducks, Bananas, Mushrooms.
**Hates:** Daily Care.

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-s8fg7](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-s8fg7.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Chelsea, a Rich Customer
<!--text-->
This customer likes shiny stuff and may overpay for it. If you balance profit and reputation, you may succeed. If you decline to serve Chelsea, your shop's reputation will improve.

**Likes:** Brand Clothes, Vegan Products, Animals.
**Hates:** Empty Shelves.

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-7l98x](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-7l98x.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Zoe, an Authentic Customer
<!--text-->
A highly passionate customer with unique values. Zoe likes people who agree with them. If you agree, Zoe might give you generous payback regarding profits and reputation.

**Likes:** Obedience.
**Hates:** Everything that's not essential.

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-14iv1](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-14iv1.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Casey, an Enforcer Customer
<!--text-->
An inspector playing their own game. They might confiscate some of your items, demanding a fine. If you refuse to pay, it will save you money but not your reputation.

**Likes:** High-value home essentials.
**Hates:** Refusal to cooperate.

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-1gksa](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-1gksa.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Alex, a Mayor Customer
<!--text-->
Entrepreneurs can rarely influence a mayor, though they enjoy good price talks. Negotiations are what made them mayors.

**Likes:** Natural Cosmetics, Healthy Food.
**Hates:** Mystical Objects.

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-l5iyt](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-l5iyt.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Nata, a Hacker Customer
<!--text-->
They might buy simple groceries to hide the offshore activity. Or make a fake purchase to exploit their taxes. Sometimes, they buy regular geek stuff and threaten to take down your store for fun.

**Likes:** Fun Stuff.
**Hates:** ??? ;)

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-1pqvo](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-1pqvo.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Sibs, Family Customers
<!--text-->
These sibs only look similar. They have opposite tastes and disagree with each other all day! Because of their unpredictability, they could be valuable clients for either profit or reputation gain.

**Like:** Fun and Parties!
**Hate:** Consensus and Routine.

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-14yx1](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-14yx1.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Kaycey, an Assertive Customer
<!--text-->
A prominent therapist and authoritative customer. They know how to manipulate sellers very well. If you refuse to serve them, they will take revenge. Aside from destroying your reputation, they will make you sell extra cheap.

**Likes:** Voodoo Dolls, Talismans
**Hates:** You?

<!--image-->
![Shop Crush-y0oyc](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/7ee0ee4175b34c398ec1ef9651d5c65f/shop-crush-y0oyc.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Mx. Malkoff, a Creative Customer
<!--text-->
Highly intelligent, careful, and delicate buyer. Claire has exquisite taste and expects things to impress them. Claire likes their favorites and is willing to sponsor them greatly. Rare to visit, though.

**Likes:** Violins, Cigarettes, Poetry.
**Hates:** Wine and everything that's banal.

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Who's Your Favorite?
<!--text-->
Don't Think - Pick!
